mapper.select: SELECT FREEBOARD_NUM,USER_NICKNAME,FREEBOARD_TITLE,FREEBOARD_TIME,FREEBOARD_CONTENT,FREEBOARD_VIEW,FREEBOARD_LIKE,FREEBOARD_HATE FROM FREEBOARD ORDER BY FREEBOARD_TIME DESC
SELECT FREEBOARD_NUM FROM FREEBOARD WHERE ROWNUM = 1 ORDER BY FREEBOARD_NUM DESC
SELECT FREEBOARD_NUM, USER_NICKNAME, FREEBOARD_TITLE,FREEBOARD_TIME,FREEBOARD_CONTENT,FREEBOARD_VIEW,FREEBOARD_LIKE,FREEBOARD_HATE FROM FREEBOARD WHERE FREEBOARD_NUM = #{freeboard_num}
SELECT FREEBOARD_NUM,FREEBOARD_TITLE FROM FREEBOARD WHERE FREEBOARD_NUM=(SELECT MIN(FREEBOARD_NUM) FROM FREEBOARD WHERE FREEBOARD_NUM > #{freeboard_num})
SELECT FREEBOARD_NUM,FREEBOARD_TITLE FROM FREEBOARD WHERE FREEBOARD_NUM=(SELECT max(FREEBOARD_NUM) FROM FREEBOARD WHERE FREEBOARD_NUM < #{freeboard_num})
mapper.update: UPDATE FREEBOARD SET FREEBOARD_VIEW = FREEBOARD_VIEW+1 WHERE FREEBOARD_NUM=#{freeboard_num}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM FREEBOARD WHERE ${keyField} LIKE '%${keyWord}%' ORDER BY FREEBOARD_TIME ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCount FROM FREEBOARD

select X.RNUM,X.FREEBOARD_NUM, X.USER_NICKNAME, X.FREEBOARD_TITLE, X.FREEBOARD_TIME,X.FREEBOARD_CONTENT,X.FREEBOARD_VIEW,X.FREEBOARD_LIKE,X.FREEBOARD_HATE,X.FREEBOARD_CATEGORY from (select rownum as rnum, A.FREEBOARD_NUM, A.USER_NICKNAME, A.FREEBOARD_TITLE, A.FREEBOARD_TIME,A.FREEBOARD_CONTENT,A.FREEBOARD_VIEW,A.FREEBOARD_LIKE,A.FREEBOARD_HATE,A.FREEBOARD_CATEGORY FROM ( select FREEBOARD_NUM, USER_NICKNAME, FREEBOARD_TITLE, FREEBOARD_TIME,FREEBOARD_CONTENT,FREEBOARD_VIEW,FREEBOARD_LIKE,FREEBOARD_HATE,FREEBOARD_CATEGORY from FREEBOARD order by FREEBOARD_NUM DESC) A where ROWNUM <= #{endNum}) X where X.rnum >= #{startNum}
